attributes.action: Stop plans to force football fans to have a vaccine passport to watch their team
attributes.additional_details: Vaccine passports are discriminatory and drive a wedge between people, rather than giving everyone an equal choice on whether to take up a vaccine.
attributes.background:
This petition insists Government abandons any system for football fans to prove their vaccine status as a condition of watching their team live at a ground.

No fan should lose out because of their choice to have a vaccine or not. 

Some will want a vaccine first. Others will attend without one.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569957
